sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const EditUser = () => { const [nama, setnama] = useState("") const [gender, setgender] = useState("Laki-laki") const [tindakan, settindakan] = useState("") const navigate = useNavigate() const saveUser = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/users', { nama, gender, tindakan }) navigate("/") } catch (error) { console.log(error); } } return (
setnama(e.target.value)} placeholder='Nama'/>
settindakan(e.target.value)} placeholder='Tindakan'/>
) } export default EditUser
